long_description: Fabulously feminine for a workout tee, the SkirtSports Julilee T-shirt is made in a quick-drying, stretchy mesh fabric for high performance when worn alone or as a base layer. Breathable polyester/spandex fabric feels soft next to skin, wicks away moisture and dries quickly to keep you comfortable. Raglan sleeves; feminine crew neck; semi-relaxed fit. Closeout.
short_description: Fabulously feminine for a workout tee, the SkirtSports Julilee T-shirt is made in a quick-drying, stretchy mesh fabric for high performance when worn alone or as a base layer.
